value:
I didn't think I'd like this kimono at
first, but the white makes me look like
I belong in the Order of Heroes.$k$pCamilla, reporting for duty,
Commander! Heehee, just
practicing...

We were celebrating the new year in
kimono as a symbol of friendship with
Hoshido.$k$pIt's important to understand each
other's cultures if you want to get
along.

It's important to take your duties
seriously, but it's New Year's! You
must take some time to relax, dear.$k$pI was hoping to have time to get to
know you better.

Be a dear and help me adjust my
sash, will you? Huh? Oh, what are
you blushing for?

Admiring my weapon? It's called a
kadomatsu. Technically it's a
decoration, but...$k$pWell, the tip is so sharp, it simply
seemed inefficient to not use it as a
weapon!

I've come with a greeting for the new
year! Now, promise you'll be a good
friend to $Nf.

This year is bound to be filled with
wonderful things.

This year is sure to be different
from the last.

Perhaps I'll take a more relaxed
approach to this year...

New power for a new year.
Heehee... Thank you.

I'm Camilla, Princess of Nohr. But this
year we're celebrating New Year's
with some Hoshidan flair!

Ahh, $Nu!
Are you enjoying the new year?$k$pWe may come from different cultures,
but spending the new year with family
seems to be common all around.$k$pAnd yet, I realize you have no family
of your own here to spend it with.$k$pI was worried you might be feeling
lonely. So, if there's ever anything I
can do, don't hesitate to tell me.$k$pAfter all, you and I are practically
family by now, aren't we? Maybe I
should start tucking you in at night.$k$pThat may even help ensure our first
dreams of the new year are of each
other! Wouldn't that be lovely?$k$pMy New Year's wish is to be closer to
you than any other Hero. Do you think
you can help make it come true?
えいっ
How about this?
くっ…！
Oh my...
Happy New Year!
Let's celebrate!
Bad form!
Let's ring in the New Year!
My outfit...!
Heehee
Here we are! The New Year—and aren't we just adorable!
I wanted to dress for the occasion. Like it?
It's a Hoshidan kimono. Quite sensual, don't you think?
Who were you with for the New Year's countdown?
This kimono isn't quite...tailored for me.
I should dress my retainers in kimonos too!
We should spend the New Year together every year, darling.
Yes?
Let's go.
Best wishes.
A New Year—and you need me already?
